headline: A Look At Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) Valuation After Mixed Recent Share Price Performance
summary: How Stanley Black & Decker stock has been trading Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) has seen mixed share performance recently, with a 1 day return showing a 1.49% decline and a 7 day return showing a 2.52% decline, while the month return stands at 10.16%. Over the past 3 months the stock shows a 17.48% return, and year to date it is up 7.86%. The 1 year total return is a 2.08% decline, compared with a 3 year total return of 7.77%. Looking further back, the 5 year total return is a 43.93% decline,...
